name: Connect4 (Dgebu)
description:
Connect 4 is a classic two-player strategy game. This version of the game has been developed by David Dgebuadze. The objective of the game is to connect four of your colored discs in a row, either vertically, horizontally, or diagonally, before your opponent does. The game requires players to think ahead and plan their moves carefully in order to outwit their opponent. With its simple rules and addictive gameplay, Connect 4 has been a favorite among families and game enthusiasts for generations.

Languages used: C#

Framework used: .net framework

editor used: Visual Studio 2022.

Setup: Inno.
